results.overview: A gritty, international tale of four separate stories woven together by a common theme: the Rapture.
results.title: Final: The Rapture

results.overview: A lonely telephone operator leading an empty, amoral life finds God — only to have her faith continually tested in ways beyond what she could have imagined.
results.title: The Rapture

results.overview: Third installment in the "The Rapture" trilogy created by Lalo Pescia.
results.title: The Rapture 3

results.overview: Detective Conad is investigating suspicious events regarding an Art Gallery and the paintings of the mysterious artist "The Rapture".
results.title: The Rapture: La Pinacoteca

results.overview: Detective Conad awakens from a terrible dream, but will soon discover the mysterious artist known as "The Rapture" is much more than a fruit of his imagination!
results.title: The Rapture: In the Radure

results.overview: A pulsating bombardment of images about our insatiable pursuit of perpetual happiness and freedom from fear. A frame by frame hand manipulated 35mm celluloid collage film, the found footage is augmented by stills that were taken from various magazines, then distorted and deformed.
results.title: The Rapture

results.overview: Told through the eyes of Casper Harrison. The Rapture is a fast paced mystery thriller where good and evil collide in the quest to possess the most holiest of artifacts, The Spear Of Destiny.
results.title: The Rapture

results.overview: A journey into the lives of a seemingly perfect family reveals a complicated past where the music of life collides with family, the church, and being saved.
results.title: The Rapture

results.overview: Directed by Johnny Wu. The Rapture is What happens when sabotage, deceit, and betrayal push trust to the breaking point? When Midael and Abaddon, two enhanced humans (Chimaeras: Midael with 15' long metal wings that shoots out like daggers, Abaddon/Job with a 15' long metal tail can manipulate energy), become part of a high-stakes and violent game of cat-and-mouse. Each Chimaera learns just how much trust can be lost when everyone they meet has an agenda.
results.title: The Rapture

results.overview: Enactment of possible events surrounding the Second Coming of Christ.
results.title: The Rapture

results.overview: Disaster strikes when a company attempts to create the first A.I Sex Robot.
results.title: The Rapture Disaster

results.original_title: The Rapture Is Live, And Well, In New York City
results.overview: A filmed performance of The Rapture at the Bowery Ballroom in New York City.
results.title: The Rapture Is Live, And Well, In New York City

results.original_title: The Rapture of Free Soloing on Acid
results.overview: This film follows the legendary climbing photographer and Stone Master, Dean Fidelman. Fidelman was at the forefront of the free climbing revolution in Yosemite Valley and Joshua Tree during the 1970s, making photographs with John Bachar, Lynn Hill, Ron Kauk, John Long, and many other talented climbers. This documentary takes a look at Fidelman's impact and influence as a photographer and climber.
results.title: The Rapture of Free Soloing on Acid

results.overview: Upon her father's death, a woman comes into emotional and psychological conflict with her young lover, her overbearing sister and her alcoholic stepmother.
results.title: The Secret Rapture

results.overview: Before the underwater city of Rapture collapsed beneath itself and Splicers roamed its flooded halls, men and women thrived as they explored beyond the limits of their creative and scientific achievements. But who were they before their society crumbled around them?
results.title: The Brothers Rapture

results.overview: The first Venezuelan feature-length film.
results.title: The Rapture

results.overview: In this metaphoric story of violence and resilience from director Alvin Yapan, Fe (Irma Adlawan) returns home to the Philippines after several years of working overseas, her job a victim of global economic shifts. Fe is initially greeted with affection by her husband Dante (Nonie Buencamino), but he has a long history of domestic violence fueled by rage and long-term impotence, and Fe quickly discovers her time away has not changed him. Dante works in a factory making baskets, and Fe soon joins him there; she becomes the lover of Arturo (T.J. Trinidad), the man who manages the basket company, but while Arturo treats her well, he's still under the thumb of his father who owns the factory. Meanwhile, an unknown admirer sends her parcels of strange black fruit on a regular basis. Torn between two men who cannot give her what she needs and wants, Fe's frustration leads to take desperate steps to establish her independence.
results.title: The Rapture of Fe

results.overview: At the beginning of the main holidays. Étienne dies, leaving his father, Patrick, and his young girlfriend with the pain and loneliness.
results.title: The Raptures

results.overview: Hungary after the changes. Jutka loses her job and even her marriage is ruined, since her husband gets involved with the daughter of an influential businessman. Jutka moves in with a female friend, Dóra likewise has to face a difficult choice.
results.title: The Rapture of Deceit

results.overview: Sennen no yuraku is set in a small community called “Roji” where Kenji Nakagami—one of the most famous novelists in Japan—drew the absurdity and passion of life since its inhabitants have been living and dying. There were beautiful men in “Roji” who struggled to live with the blood of the Nakamato Clan, blood called “noble yet unholy.” Oryu, a midwife, has watched all those men growing up, living and dying... She is now aging old and starts to talk with the dead men souls of the Nakamoto Clan...
results.title: The Millennial Rapture
